reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant and flattering, complimenting curves well and being super stretchy. However, the fit and material quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it's amazing, others find it big in the waist and booty with thin, cheap fabric. Moreover, the length gets mixed reviews, with some finding it great while others say it's too long, and several customers note it's see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whoa baby!
items.body: Iâ€™ll be honest- when I first opened my package I was not pleased with the color- because it was the first thing that stood out. itâ€™s more of a neon salmon/orange color - then I tried it on and holy cow!! The way it hugged my curves had me smiling from ear to ear- super comfy, super sexy! The open back is to die for! Itâ€™s a stretchy material- tags show itâ€™s 83% polyester and 11% elastane - the quality is good! I dig it! But man oh man what a dress! Perfect for elegant parties, cocktail parties, weddings, proms, a fancy anniversary dinner date, new years, shoot! The list goes on! Just buy it already. Iâ€™m still not a huge fan of the neon color but thatâ€™s a â€œmeâ€ problem lol however I did buy it in green and black- canâ€™t wait to get them! Sent a photo out to the group chat to get them opinions and 10/10 of my besties gave heart eyes and fire emojis! Buy it! There is no disappointment here ladies! Sexy but classy - sheeeesh. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 and itâ€™s a little long but itâ€™s a perfect length when I have my heels on. The only thing that is lengthy is the sash but I think itâ€™s meant to be like that. Might have to hold onto it when moving around. Overall itâ€™s a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Honey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress! Donâ€™t hesitate!
items.body: Absolutely loved this dress. The fabric is amazing, flowed and the fit was spot on. The tail was way too long . I LOVED this dress. I felt beautiful in it. I work it for my 33rd anniversary. Read more
items.author: Michelle

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and decent value
items.body: The dress is pretty and very flattering. Definitely thin material and a little see through. My biggest issue was getting the wrinkles out from the shipping. I steamed and ironed several times and finally just gave up. Read more
items.author: Carly Hansis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy show stopper
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear to an all white party and baby when I tell you it was a show stopper!! I thought it would be see through due to the material ,but suprisingly it wasnâ€™t. Itâ€™s very comfy and fits like a glove! The cuts over the dress are in all the right places and compliments curves very well. I am 5 11â€ the dress was really long so if youâ€™re a shorter stature keep that in mind. The color white compliments brown skin so well. I got so many compliments this night . Iâ€™d definitely recommend purchasing this dress. Read more
items.author: Lamica

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for everyone... fabric is very thin and revealing
items.body: This dress is a knock out, but unfortunately the fabric is way to thin. Even with the proper undergarments to make a dress like this work... it was just to revealing for my preference. A sexy silhouette is one thing but absolutely everything was on display through the thin fabric. Gorgeous design though! Read more
items.author: Daniella

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very big
items.body: I wear small and so I ordered small but this dress is huge and doesnâ€™t fit how it supposed to. For me to wear it I have to take it to a seamstress to get it altered. So now I have to go look for a dress in an actual store now that I can try on and make sure it fits me perfectly because I canâ€™t afford to order online again and then it doesnâ€™t fit good and Iâ€™m in the same situation. The wedding I have to go to is just two weeks away. Iâ€™m really disappointed because I loved this dress how it looked, sexy, sassy and classy but looks like I may not be wearing it unless a seamstress does a really good job at making it fit me perfectly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Elegant Dress (made with Quality Material)
items.body: Yâ€™all, this dress was SO beautiful on!!! It was made of thick, quality material that had a lot of stretch to it as well. The long strap allows for a lot of versatility in regard to being able to wear/style the dress in many different ways. The open, low plunging back line combined with the scrunched gathering around the derriÃ¨re was definitely a head turner at the concert I attended! This was my first time ever purchasing a dress from Amazon, and letâ€™s just say I was NOT disappointed. I wore 4in heels with this dress, and it still dragged the ground a little so be aware of that if youâ€™re vertically challenged like myself. (For reference: Iâ€™m 5â€™1, around 155lbs, with a 34DDD bra size & I purchased a medium.) Overall, I wouldnâ€™t hesitate to purchase this dress again in a different color! Read more
items.author: Poppy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So elegant
items.body: 10/10! great fit, high quality material, thick material and the length? PERFECT ðŸ˜™ðŸ¤ŒðŸ¼ Read more
items.author: Maddi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Bodycon Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-white, B-wine Red, A-black, B-rose, B-black, A-pink, B-blue, B-orange, B-white, B-green, B-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
